answerText: Helen Vendler[10] Due to excessive license fees, Dove failed to include any works by this poet in the anthology. This author of "Wales Visitation" wrote about "shopping for images" and finding Walt Whitman in "A Supermarket in California."
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Harvard  | 18 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In the essay "Are These the Poems to Remember," this writer criticized Rita Dove for including too many minority poets in The Penguin Anthology of 20th Century American Poetry. For 10 points each. [10] Name this Harvard poetry critic, who is best known for her work on Wallace Stevens in On Extended Wings.
